description: Medicare payment to ESRD facilities for outpatient maintenance dialysis services furnished to Medicare beneficiaries with End-Stage Renal Disease (ESRD) is based on a prospective payment system known as the basic case-mix adjusted composite payment system. The base composite rate covers the costs of the dialysis treatment and certain routine drugs, laboratory tests, and supplies furnished at home or in a facility.
keyword: Publically Available Data File - for download
title: ESRD Payment System
